experience.title: Escuela Internacional Sampedrana | 2024

experience.additional: * Below you can read a detailed summary of my work developed during this experience and how I used ISO/IEC standards to improve software quality.
experience.description: Built and shipped 15 full-stack modules with SAP Business One integration in 6 months, focusing on UX, maintainability, and operational efficiency. Led UI planning, reduced ERP dependency through a custom SAP emulator, and improved product quality using ISO/IEC  standards.

animated-list.name: UI-First Design
animated-list.description: Designed UI-first solutions, applying UX best practices to improve usability and operational efficiency.

animated-list.name: Frontend Planning
animated-list.description: Led frontend planning by creating wireframes and user flows, identifying bottlenecks early and minimizing rework.

animated-list.name: Technical Documentation
animated-list.description: Produced core technical documentation (knowledge base, Git/GitHub best practices, Agile proposal), translating pain points into actionable process improvements.

experience.title: Virtual & On-Site Medical Clinic Web Application | 2023
experience.excerpt: Full-Stack Developer ‚ú¶ Healthcare Web Platform ‚ú¶ REST API
experience.description: Designed and developed a web application for a medical clinic supporting both virtual and in-person consultations. Focused on scalable architecture, intuitive user experiences, and robust backend services to ensure reliability and usability in a healthcare context.

animated-list.name: User-Centered Design
animated-list.description: Designed user-centered interfaces and experiences to improve usability and overall application quality.

animated-list.name: Scrum Leadership
animated-list.description: Worked under the Scrum framework as Scrum Master, ensuring team alignment and adherence to agile best practices.

animated-list.name: REST API Development
animated-list.description: Built a RESTful API using JavaScript, Node.js, and Express.js to support core application features.
